What is the outlook for Leukodystrophy ?,The prognosis for the leukodystrophies varies according to the specific type of leukodystrophy.,NINDS,Leukodystrophy
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Leukodystrophy ?,"The NINDS supports research on genetic disorders, including the leukodystrophies. The goals of this research are to increase scientific understanding of these disorders, and to find way
